Above: 1811-09-30 Theatre-Royal, Haymarket

Melodrama Playbills is a minimal computing project for producing digital exhibitions focused on longevity, low costs, and flexibility. Our underlying technology is made to learn and to teach, and can produce beautifully rendered, high-quality image collections and scholarly exhibits. To start using Wax, please see our documentation for installation instructions and more.

Example second paragraph.

The collection items in this demo are from The Museum of Islamic Art, Qatar, (courtesy of WikiMedia and Google Art Project) and The Qatar National Library (via World Digital Library).
